QueryResult.text: select odf_ca_clr_contrctr_invoice.id object_instance_id, a.user_id from cmn_sec_chk_user_v0 a, odf_ca_clr_contrctr_invoice where a.object_id = 5021421 and a.permission_code = 'READ' and a.object_instance_id = odf_ca_clr_contrctr_invoice.id UNION select odf_ca_clr_contrctr_invoice.id object_instance_id, a.user_id from cmn_sec_chk_user_v0 a, odf_ca_clr_contrctr_invoice where a.object_id in (5021423) and a.permission_code = 'READ' and a.object_instance_id = odf_ca_clr_contrctr_invoice.odf_parent_id UNION select odf_ca_clr_contrctr_invoice.id object_instance_id, a.user_id from cmn_sec_chk_user_v0 a, odf_ca_clr_contrctr_invoice where a.object_id in (null) and a.permission_code = 'READ' and a.object_instance_id = (select odf_parent_id from odf_ca_clr_contractor where id = odf_ca_clr_contrctr_invoice.odf_parent_id)
